CustomField.description: ** System Calculated Required Override ** The Base Title Tag is used as a prefix or suffix to all child Page "Title Tags". For example : "My Custom Page < My Base Title Tag". Defaults to the name of the Site.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated Required Override ** The Base Title Tag is used as a prefix or suffix to all child Page "Title Tags". For example : "My Custom Page < My Base Title Tag". Defaults to the name of the Site.
CustomField.label: Base Title Tag
